title: Treatment for Depression: Talk Therapy or Medication? (Thomas Jefferson University)
text: ( Source : Thomas Jefferson University ) Patients who are suffering from depression are often recommended a course of treatment that includes talk therapy and/or medication. However, recent studies suggest that the benefits of these methods
